title: Mr.suevie
author: Mr.suevie
content: When I was growing up, I had a lot of experience gambling on games like:---arm wrestling---card game----PlayStation competition----dice ----animal racing----food eating gamble----playing soccerAnd so much more but its seem the world has evolved so greatly and many things we do before, have now been inputed in the internet and its now makes it access alot easier but I had some recent arguments with some folks in my locality that before, gambling physically with people was more fun than doing online in these recent casino that seem to cover all of our old gambling habits but I argued on the latter. So I thought I should drop here and here some of opinion of most advance gamblers with lots of gambling experience.

comments.author: Solosanz
comments.body: The above gambling you're listed above is PVP games and sports, not a physical gambling where you're playing poke with a dealer, play slot machine and any other games where you're played on the physical casino.Internet gambling or online gambling is more secure and avoiding drama due to friend, it's better for solo player who doesn't have any friend or don't want to let his friend know if he's a gambler.

comments.author: CarnagexD
comments.body: Physical gambling is more fun where you are able to see the emotions and actions of the people around you and use it at your advantage. But I think what you've listed above are more like just games where you take risks, not gambling where you bet money. Quote from: Solosanz on March 17, 2023, 08:36:34 AMThe above gambling you're listed above is PVP games and sports, not a physical gambling where you're playing poke with a dealer, play slot machine and any other games where you're played on the physical casino.Internet gambling or online gambling is more secure and avoiding drama due to friend, it's better for solo player who doesn't have any friend or don't want to let his friend know if he's a gambler.Yeah online gambling allows people to play bet on games while hiding their identities. I think it has an edge for people who prefer the convenience of not going to casinos and who wants to deposit and withdraw money easily.

comments.author: 348Judah
comments.body: There's more things that need clarification about physical gambling and online gambling, there's a recent topic about online casinos and street gambling which is better, but when we talk about the physical gambling here, it can either be the live matches organized by people for gambling or the one gamblers appears at the gambling station or casino house to bet, all these depends on our choices and preferences and both were fun to have.

comments.author: Baofeng
comments.body: As what @Solosanz said, it's more of a PvP (Player vs Player), so of course there is this element of interaction and obviously it is going to be more fun. But if you are comparing like going to physical casinos vs playing online, it's really up to the individual itself.There are people who prior to the advent of online casinos, would rather play and go to traditional base casinos to play, insert their money on a slot machine, or sit on a table for a baccarat or black jack, or roll a dice in a craps game. And so it's more fun as there are also other gamblers that you might know in that casino or even had talks with the dealer itself.Or just stay at home, at the comfort of your living room or bed room, deposit some crypto and then play live roulette as if you are in the casinos. Or just slot games or sports betting.

comments.author: Wexnident
comments.body: My first experience with gambling was in person but it hasn't really influenced my personal preference for playing online. I think it just depends on your personality. I'm a rather introverted type of guy, I'd 100% choose to spend the day in my house doing whatever the hell I want if possible compared to going out on trips and whatnot. Not to say that I wouldn't go out, just that I prefer staying inside, it's not really related to my gambling habits or anything, I reckon I'd do the same stuff whether it was online or not really.

comments.author: Mr. Magkaisa
comments.body: Quote from: CarnagexD on March 17, 2023, 01:15:11 PMPhysical gambling is more fun where you are able to see the emotions and actions of the people around you and use it at your advantage. But I think what you've listed above are more like just games where you take risks, not gambling where you bet money. Quote from: Solosanz on March 17, 2023, 08:36:34 AMThe above gambling you're listed above is PVP games and sports, not a physical gambling where you're playing poke with a dealer, play slot machine and any other games where you're played on the physical casino.Internet gambling or online gambling is more secure and avoiding drama due to friend, it's better for solo player who doesn't have any friend or don't want to let his friend know if he's a gambler.Yeah online gambling allows people to play bet on games while hiding their identities. I think it has an edge for people who prefer the convenience of not going to casinos and who wants to deposit and withdraw money easily.    -   You seem to like physical gambling mate hehe... But as you said it's better to gamble online, because if I compare it to a physical casino it's a bit hassle and dangerous too.It's really different from online because apart from being at home, you can enjoy your time to the fullest as long as the casino you put your money in is right so you don't get scammed, it's that simple.

comments.author: Jody.Drummer
comments.body: Playing gambling is physically more fun because we interact directly with people who also play there, even interact directly with the dealer, and we don't find that in online gambling. However, for easy access and time efficiency, online gambling is very efficient. We can access anytime and anywhere.It's natural that physical gambling might be more fun, but for people who don't like crowds, online gambling is more fun. This goes back to each of us in my opinion, which place is more fun in our opinion, physical gambling or online gambling.

comments.author: Fesatmas
comments.body: I prefer online gambling to physical gambling, it's not something that makes me sentimental about the environment, but for me, who doesn't mix actively in society, of course it's very awkward if I do physical gambling. Because maybe I feel that I am an introvert who prefers peace. I prefer online or internet gambling because that is not something that makes me not have pressure from outside my environment when playing gambling.I think more people in this forum like internet or online gambling because it's easier and doesn't appeal to the public's point of view.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: If I can remember very well when I was so much in street, if I should be sincere about this, gambling among friends is more fun than gambling online today, it is 50:50 chance of winning or losing, so nothing like house edge and you move your body and have fun during the time.  But it has disadvantages too, the main disadvantage is when gambling with somekne you may know though but not that your friend and your bet result to fight, it can be brutal. Online gambling is fun too, but not fun like while I am gambling with friends directly at that time. I even remember when I was in high school, we use to read the past questions for the exams that we are going to do to enter university, we even used it to gamble, like telling a friend that he can not get certain score when answering past questions, and gamble for it. This made us to be very serious and gamble with what helped us. Like I said, online gambling is fun, it also has its advantage, like no fight with who you are gambling with, but house edge makes it kind of partial, but well making the gambling industry to grow.

comments.author: Yatsan
comments.body: Traditional street gambling game you should say? These are common gambling activities you'd grow up if in places wherein such activity is dominant. But on my experience dominant card games on streets are card related gambling games simply because it is more accessible. Regarding online platform, it is part of technological advancements; a matter as well of adapting with changes. Most of the people nowadays are more into online activities and with this, activities we often do on the actual or real life instances also moved into the web. Other examples are mailing. But not to get far from the topic; regardless of the platform the activity itself is entertaining as long as you are able to manage the risks in gambling, it won't be stressful. Managing risk is simply managing gambling behavior.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Gamblers have two personalities, the extrovert, and the introvert, extrovert like company crowds, and companions they are the ones likely to prefer physical casinos because of the ambiance that is suited to their character, on the other those introverts are likely to choose online casinos because they prefer to be alone while betting and they want quiet surrounding.But of course, there are extroverts that are playing online and introverts that play in physical casinos but when it comes to preferences these two personalities will likely suit their character.Since I am an introvert I prefer playing online I am more comfortable playing online than offline or on physical casinos.

comments.author: AbuBhakar
comments.body: Physical gambling is more fun because you experienced it first hand. It’s like sex which physically is much better because you can feel the intensity of what you’re doing.Obviously those user that will choose online over physical gambling doesn’t experience the physical gaming. No offense, Online gambling is good because it’s convenient but physical gambling is the best if it comes to fun.

comments.author: Peanutswar
comments.body: Online gambling gives convenience to people because they don't need to get outside of their houses and visit the actual casino instead they can access it with their devices easily some of the casinos right now is supporting the use of banks, cryptocurrencies and another rise-up mode kind of payment. The physical casino gives more entertainment of course there are a lot of actual games you can play and get fun along with other players, also more than that they could provide other services so the players could really enjoy playing gambling like shows, drinks and etc. If there's a chance I could go to a casino like in Las Vegas ill grab the opportunity to come right there.

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: Having to laugh with friends you gamble with makes physical gambling worthwhile. It's how it should be but because things have evolved we can already do it with our phones as well. So it depends on your preference. Quote from: AbuBhakar on March 17, 2023, 03:38:55 PMPhysical gambling is more fun because you experienced it first hand. It’s like sex which physically is much better because you can feel the intensity of what you’re doing.Obviously those user that will choose online over physical gambling doesn’t experience the physical gaming. No offense, Online gambling is good because it’s convenient but physical gambling is the best if it comes to fun.I like the analogy. I guess those who are jacking off the webcam are like online gambling.     I agree about physical gambling is more fun though. I like it better with my cousins and friends and not inside a casino. Its the time when we get together, play cards and drink beers.

comments.author: ralle14
comments.body: I'd say both of them can be more fun if you're gambling with your friends but i'd prefer internet gambling over physical because it's faster and more convenient. Also, there are more options to choose from aside from just sports and casino games. In my view, each of them can be just as fun as long as you know how to level up the experience like meeting the right group of people or participating in other gambling events.

comments.author: maydna
comments.body: Well, for some people, offline gambling as you mentioned, can provide greater pleasure than online gambling because you can meet other people who will be your betting opponent.But with today's progress, many people have switched to online gambling, where they don't need to go to a physical casino or other places. They can gamble from home, using cell phones, laptops, or computers. Today everything has been facilitated by technology, and we must be grateful for that technology. And I still prefer online gambling to offline gambling even though it provides more fun, and I think it depends on each person.

comments.author: alastantiger
comments.body: Both physical and internet gambling are both fun but considering the old days gambling and present digital gambling, internet gambling is more fun because it is less risk and more secured. That of physical gambling is also risky but the fact that in an online gambling, you dont have physical contact with your opponent and when you win no one know anything about your money unlike the physical gambling where you may be attacked by your loosing opponent. That makes internet gambling more fun than the physical. Again, internet gambling goves you the opportunity to play more than one game.

comments.author: passwordnow
comments.body: I know how it feels to remember the past and how's the feeling there and the fun, joy, and enjoyment that it has brought us. Yeah, too many things have changed due to the evolution of technology that includes the usage of the internet. Change is constant and we can't stop or slow it down. I may not have that much gambling experience but I've also seen those changes as a teen that have become a gambler and saw the traditional games up to the common and modern ones. Let's just enjoy the current one and reminisce the old experiences but that doesn't mean we can't do it anymore.

comments.author: tusandii
comments.body: If it's just for entertainment and fun, gambling physically with several people or friends directly is the right choice because we can also chat and laugh together so we can have more fun.But if gambling with the main goal is to get big wins and profits, we have to use online casinos where there are lots of games or bets with very big profit opportunities. In fact, we can really use the advantages of playing at online casinos to help our economy or finances if you can play wisely and correctly.But all of that is just an expression because in fact every best choice depends on ourselves according to the needs we need.
